des: "Sounds a little crazy, but this deep fried crispy spinach is something the kids will even eat! Light, crispy, and so good."
ins: Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Place a large handful of fresh spinach in fryer basket, and submerge to cook for about thirty seconds. Drain spinach on paper towels, and repeat with remaining batches. Add a little salt and pepper to taste.
